lead_paragraph: The United States Central Command altered its analysis to portray a more optimistic picture of the war than events in Iraq and Syria warranted, a report concluded.

headline.print_headline: Military Officials Distorted Intelligence on ISIS, Report Says
headline.main: Military Officials Distorted ISIS Intelligence, Congressional Panel Says

snippet: The United States Central Command altered its analysis to portray a more optimistic picture of the war than events in Iraq and Syria warranted, a report concluded....
abstract: Republican-organized Congressional panel finds officials from United States Central Command altered intelligence reports to paint overly optimistic picture of war against Islamic State in Iraq and Syria; Democratic lawmakers release findings that agree with some conclusions of Republican task force.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
